mms.controller.interfaces

Interface IFilmListController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilmListController

    public interface IFilmListController
    Interface that define the FilmListController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doFillCmb()
      Fills the combo box with all the shop codes which the customer is subscribed to.
      void generateTableFilmList(java.lang.Integer currShop, java.lang.Object[] filter)
      This method generates a film list filtered by the variable filter.
      void generateTableRecent(java.lang.Integer currShop, java.lang.Object[] filter)
      This method generates a film list ordered by the insertion date and filtered by the variable filter.
      void generateTableTopBought(java.lang.Integer currShop, java.lang.Object[] filter)
      This method changes the list of films with a new list ordered by the number of purchases and filtered by the variable filter.
      void generateTableTopVisited(java.lang.Integer currShop, java.lang.Object[] filter)
      This method changes the list of films with a new list ordered by number of views and filtered by the variable filter.
      void getNewCard()
      If the customer has not already a card, it creates a new one.
      void selectDiscount()
      If the customer has a card, opens up the editable card view.
      void showDetailsFilm(java.lang.Integer filmCode, java.lang.Integer shopCode)
      This method returns the details of the film inserted.

    • Method Detail

      • showDetailsFilm

        void showDetailsFilm(java.lang.Integer filmCode,
                   java.lang.Integer shopCode)
        This method returns the details of the film inserted.
        Parameters:
        filmCode - the film code.
        shopCode - the shop code.

      • generateTableTopVisited

        void generateTableTopVisited(java.lang.Integer currShop,
                           java.lang.Object[] filter)
        This method changes the list of films with a new list ordered by number of views and filtered by the variable filter.
        Parameters:
        currShop - the shop code.
        filter - this parameter pass all the filter chosen.

        filter - this parameter pass all the filter chosen.
